name: The Kindness of Strangers
description: The story of people whose lives intertwine during a dramatic winter in New York City.

review.author: therealjaysmoke
review.heading: Why is this movie rated so low?
review.reviewBody: Brilliant story, brilliant acting, brilliant directing. I don't understand why this movie has a low rating. From the very beginning, it captures you, quite sad at some point but it just kept getting better. A well deserving ending I must say.

keywords: russian restaurant,manhattan new york city,policeman,soup kitchen,support group
